statements: SELECT * FROM womens_education
SELECT name, education_level, scholarship_awarded FROM womens_education
SELECT id, scholarship_amount FROM womens_education WHERE scholarship_awarded = true
SELECT * FROM womens_education WHERE scholarship_amount > 5000
SELECT name, education_level FROM womens_education ORDER BY scholarship_amount DESC
SELECT id, name, education_level, scholarship_awarded, scholarship_amount FROM womens_education WHERE scholarship_awarded = TRUE ORDER BY education_level DESC, scholarship_amount ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT name, education_level FROM womens_education WHERE education_level = 'Bachelor'
SELECT id, name, education_level FROM womens_education WHERE scholarship_amount > 5000
SELECT id, name, education_level, scholarship_amount FROM womens_education ORDER BY scholarship_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM womens_education WHERE scholarship_awarded = FALSE
SELECT * FROM women_educational_achievements;
SELECT id, name, level_of_education FROM women_educational_achievements WHERE level_of_education='Bachelor';
SELECT name, achievement_description FROM women_educational_achievements WHERE id=3;
SELECT recipient_name, scholarship_amount, sponsoring_organization FROM scholarships_awarded ORDER BY scholarship_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM scholarships_awarded WHERE sponsoring_organization='XYZ Foundation';
SELECT * FROM women_educational_achievements WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, level_of_education FROM women_educational_achievements WHERE level_of_education = 'Bachelor';
SELECT * FROM women_educational_achievements WHERE level_of_education IN ('PhD', 'Master') ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT recipient_name, scholarship_amount, sponsoring_organization FROM scholarships_awarded WHERE scholarship_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM scholarships_awarded WHERE sponsoring_organization LIKE '%Women%' ORDER BY scholarship_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM women_education WHERE education_level = 'Master's';
SELECT id, name, education_level FROM women_education ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT recipient_name, scholarship_name, amount FROM scholarships_awarded WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT year, gap_percentage FROM gender_gap_progress WHERE gap_percentage > 10 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT id, name, achievement FROM women_education WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, name, education_level FROM women_education;
SELECT * FROM scholarships_awarded WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT recipient_name, scholarship_name, year FROM scholarships_awarded WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM gender_gap_progress WHERE gap_percentage BETWEEN 5.0 AND 10.0;
SELECT id, year, gap_percentage FROM gender_gap_progress ORDER BY year ASC, gap_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM womens_education ORDER BY graduation_year DESC;
SELECT name, degree FROM womens_education WHERE scholarship_awarded = TRUE;
SELECT scholarship_type, amount FROM scholarships WHERE awarded_year = 2021 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT student_id, progress_percentage FROM education_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 80;
SELECT year, gender_gap_percentage FROM gender_gap_progress WHERE target_completion_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM womens_education WHERE graduation_year > 2010;
SELECT name, degree FROM womens_education WHERE scholarship_awarded = TRUE;
SELECT DISTINCT degree, graduation_year FROM womens_education ORDER BY graduation_year DESC;
SELECT e.id, e.student_id, p.progress_percentage FROM education_progress AS p INNER JOIN scholarships AS s ON p.scholarship_id = s.id INNER JOIN womens_education AS e ON e.id = s.recipient_id;
SELECT AVG(gender_gap_percentage) AS avg_gender_gap FROM gender_gap_progress WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020;
SELECT * FROM WomenEducationalAchievements;
SELECT id, name, education_level FROM WomenEducationalAchievements WHERE education_level='Masters';
SELECT name, achievement FROM WomenEducationalAchievements WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT scholarship_name, amount FROM Scholarships ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT Gender, AVG(age) AS Average_Age FROM Recipients GROUP BY Gender;
SELECT * FROM WomenEducationalAchievements WHERE education_level = 'PhD';
SELECT name, achievement FROM WomenEducationalAchievements WHERE education_level = 'Master' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, scholarship_name, amount FROM Scholarships WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM Recipients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age > 25 AND name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT gap_percentage, year FROM GenderEducationGap WHERE gap_percentage < 5.0 ORDER BY year DESC;
